prompt: Discuss the advantages of NoSQL databases in modern web applications.

criteria.name: Conceptual Understanding
criteria.description: Demonstrates deep understanding of NoSQL database types and core concepts.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Clearly explains multiple NoSQL types (document, key-value, column, graph) and their features with accuracy.
performance_descriptors.good: Explains at least two NoSQL types and their core features.
performance_descriptors.average: Mentions NoSQL but gives limited explanation of types.
performance_descriptors.needs_improvement: Minimal or unclear understanding of NoSQL concepts.

criteria.name: Application to Modern Web Applications
criteria.description: Explains how NoSQL features address web application requirements.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Insightfully links scalability, flexibility, performance, and schema-less design to modern web app needs.
performance_descriptors.good: Describes key advantages such as scalability and flexibility with relevant context.
performance_descriptors.average: States benefits without depth or connection to web app needs.
performance_descriptors.needs_improvement: Mentions advantages vaguely or without support.

criteria.name: Use of Real-World Examples
criteria.description: Provides examples of NoSQL adoption in industry.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Provides multiple, relevant real-world examples with clear explanations.
performance_descriptors.good: Includes at least one appropriate example with brief explanation.
performance_descriptors.average: Example is vague or minimally explained.

criteria.name: Structure and Academic Writing
criteria.description: Quality of organization, tone, and clarity.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Highly structured, formal tone, clear progression of ideas.
performance_descriptors.good: Mostly clear and formal with minor lapses.

key_points: Defines NoSQL and explains four main types: document, key-value, column, and graph
Links scalability, performance, and schema flexibility to web app demands
Highlights suitability for high-traffic, evolving applications
llm_questions: What are the different types of NoSQL databases and their main features?
How does NoSQL improve scalability in web applications?
Why is schema flexibility valuable for modern apps?
Which companies use NoSQL and why?
How do NoSQL databases handle very large datasets?
